bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition of the three qi cold, moisture and wind jointly causing bi bing 痹病 , blockage disease, with the joints of one’s limbs aching and experiencing swelling and distension. In extreme cases this leads to an inability to move. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry qin jiao 秦艽：主寒熱邪氣，寒濕風痹，肢節痛 , “It controls cold and heat evil qi, cold, moisture and wind blockage , and aching limbs and joints”.
